long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin is dedicated to copy info of LIU student from his curriculum page (it works for both green screen and blue screen curriculum pages). The copying is done with rich text formatting.
When the button is clicked, the info will be copied directly to the clipboard.
The user will only need to copy the data to his email.
